column3: “love love love this strain. Its loving time when I whip this jar out. Look out wife!!!”

“Quoted from www.bakelife.com just cuz they say it best.

Blue Moonshine is a powerful Indica plant
column4: that produces highs that are similar to the effect produced by hash. In fact for growers looking to make good hash this is a good plant to start with. The name of this strain was reportedly coined in a dream.

column1: Blue Moonshine is related to the White Widow strain family. That's partly why the buds are so dense and c...”"

column3:
“This is the strain that I needed to help me sleep. I have chronic insomnia and anxiety. I have been on sleeping meds for a long time that didn't put me into deep sleep. 

Vaping one hit gave me just what I needed to sleep deeply, something I haven't had in a few years. Also, one hit was just enough to not get me paranoid, but just enough so I am happy and am able to sleep the whole night.”

“As a rule I tend to prefer sativa strains but Blue Moonshine really made me rethink my stance on indicas. As mentioned it's very potent and so it's easy to wind up couch locked but it relaxes your whole body to the point where even if you could move you wouldn't be any to. It really helped with my back pain too, I'd highly recommend this strain to most.”

“good balance, not so strong you get paranoid from it, and not so weak that you barely feel anything... it gave me a nice euphoric high and made me hungry, lasted about 3 hours fully, and no crash at the end... one of my favs! 9/10”
“Blue Moonshine, good for night time.  Buy again.  Relaxed body.  Head still able to think.  Reduced anxiety.”

“Big purpley flowers with a distinct sweet blueberry aroma. Colorful, fragrant and sexy, this babe is willing to please. Somewhat aggressive, with a sour blueberry mash flavor. A dazzler for sure that will hold you attention all night, giving you a scenes of clarity and relaxation. Great for those warm romantic & cuddly night, making music and movies come alive.”

“this strain was one i found on leafly. when I got it, i opened the bag and smelled the bud. it had a pleasant, sweet smell on it and it was very VERY leafy. Nice long flowery buds that had a dry feel about them. i put a large nug in my bong and i took that first hit and damn.. it blew me away. definitely for night time consumption. put me on my ass REAL quick. didn't wake up til the next morning! great for anyone wit...”

“Big purpley flowers with a distinct sweet blueberry aroma. Colorful, fragrant and sexy, this babe is willing to please. Somewhat aggressive, with a sour blueberry mash flavor. A dazzler for sure that will hold you attention all night, giving you a scenes of clarity and relaxation. Great for those warm romantic & cuddly night, making music and movies come alive.”
“Very relaxed. No munchies. Good high. Not sleepy.”
“love it! tasty and a great high. if youre an indica lover.....you must try this.”

“Sunshine Daydream x bubba x bluemoonshine from Sweet Leaf Farm's AZ. New to rosin but damn the high from rosin is unlike any other and taste WOW.
I found this strain flavor pop's of orange diesel and blueberries.Perked me up real quick and was focused with cbd on board felt like the way I feel with OG's or Ocean Grown for the follower's :) 
Felt my intrusive thought's cease and was ready to head out to grocery store ...”

“I love this Indica. The current batch I'm smoking was bought and grown by Lighthouse Organics in Billings Mt. (4 grams at $8 a gram on sale) This strain greets you like a fine wine with its pungent sweet smell, then when you crack these dense spungy buds the blueberry is released as if a burst berry itself - the smoke is heavy, tasting of cotton candy, but not overwhelmingly harsh which pars well with the effects of ...”

“I purchased an ounce of Blue Moonshine for $100 at a dispensary. I was already overtired from working double shifts three days in a row. Sleeping in after  my last shift of the week wasn’t helping.  That day, I purchased an ounce and rolled a good-size joint.  Half-way through smoking it, I got motivated to clean my kitchen,  then I zonked out and napped for over an hour.  I woke up feeling  full of energy with some ...”
“Excellent for pain & just to chillax.”
“Good for PMS”

“I've had a higher powered strain known as shishkaberry, it displays the same characteristics as Shishka,  so I was a little cautious since Muscle Spasms and Tingly Are culprits for me to avoid. However taken lightly this strain is great for relaxing in a different way, but be warned I am a veteran smoker and this can knock you on your ass watch out for its overpowering body high. If your active its good for staying a...”
“Very relaxed. No munchies. Good high. Not sleepy.”
“This strain is nice for people who are new to cannabis. I love this strain ! It helps me with pain, & I get the munchies like crazy lol but it helps to relax and it put me right to sleep.”
“I'm not sure if this is the same strain, as mine was just called Moonshine". That being said
column4: I LOVED this strain. So smooth going done had a sweet almost ginger snap flavour to it. Feeling very elated and relaxed. Full circle sort of feeling. Really enjoying the effects of this one.”"

column3: “I purchased an ounce of Blue Moonshine for $100 at a dispensary. I was already overtired from working double shifts three days in a row. Sleeping in after  my last shift of the week wasn’t helping.  That day, I purchased an ounce and rolled a good-size joint.  Half-way through smoking it, I got motivated to clean my kitchen,  then I zonked out and napped for over an hour.  I woke up feeling  full of energy with some ...”
“Good for PMS”

“Sunshine Daydream x bubba x bluemoonshine from Sweet Leaf Farm's AZ. New to rosin but damn the high from rosin is unlike any other and taste WOW.
I found this strain flavor pop's of orange diesel and blueberries.Perked me up real quick and was focused with cbd on board felt like the way I feel with OG's or Ocean Grown for the follower's :) 
Felt my intrusive thought's cease and was ready to head out to grocery store ...”

“Before: Meh, not as keen as I thought I'd be to smoke.

Smoking Joint: Woh, hitting fast. Calling it, not smoking the last quarter. 

High: I feel like dancing :D”
“love it! tasty and a great high. if youre an indica lover.....you must try this.”

“I've had a higher powered strain known as shishkaberry, it displays the same characteristics as Shishka,  so I was a little cautious since Muscle Spasms and Tingly Are culprits for me to avoid. However taken lightly this strain is great for relaxing in a different way, but be warned I am a veteran smoker and this can knock you on your ass watch out for its overpowering body high. If your active its good for staying a...”

“Hoping that this is similar to my blue dream i had a week ago. Had a few sesh's with this and i can see some similarities. I get the same cool with anything type of high with a bit more giggly effects. very satisfied with this strain, and however much i despise indica's, this strain seems to have minimal chances of couch lock. 

Im happy :)”

“Let me preface by saying this was my first foray back into the cannabis world after many years away.  I had the budtender at the 420 spot pick it out as I was a bit overwhelmed with the choices.

I of course chose a VERY strong indica but took it slow.
Took 1 hit and it took about 2 minutes to hit.
Quick ramp up to super high took about 15 minutes, then nice ride for about 50 minutes.   Very big couch lock"
“nice I've had all those buds n I highly recommend you have got to try”
“makes me feel extremely relaxed and giggly. one of my favorites.”
“Banger strain very much enjoyed just what i wanted from an indica nice and happy but relaxed, very tasty as well”

“Tried it mixed half and half with Panama Red.   Can definitely feel the pain
relieving Indica at work.”
“nice scent. decent body high. the concentrate worked instantly to release muscular stress in the neck and shoulders. good one for couch time right before bed.”
“Oh My!!! Thanks Leafly! This stuff SLAPPED me in the face when I broke the seal.... Only thing I keep saying is OH MY!”
“Nasty, gave me a instinct headache. Would not recommend.”
“Ridiculously good bud if u like a dank indica. A deep high. Someone said it before but a bit hash like.”

“This is intense. Very strong indica. Tried it two different times and felt like I was way too high and got a bit paranoid in public. I know this strain is popular but probably for higher tolerances.”
“Very nice strain from DJ Short.”
“Realy like the taste and a good high”
“Banger strain very much enjoyed just what i wanted from an indica nice and happy but relaxed, very tasty as well”
“Hands down the best plant ever...I have been growing it now for over 13 years and it crushes me every time.. Dont miss out if you can get some..”
“AWESOME”
“really good body high. i defently recomend it. a little sleepy”

“Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer.

Pros: Good for pain and relaxation that can help with sleep. Starts by relaxing the mind then spreads into the body. 

Cons: While pull was normal, there was a little harshness on exhale at times. Some dry mouth and eyes.

Overall/Other: Berry taste with hints of pine. Can make you giggly and sleepy.  Little case of the munchies. No real couch lock, unless you count the slee...”

“One of the first strains I tried. Good at getting me relaxed. But as I came down from the effects I noticed recurring headaches. They were tolerable so I finished off the oz I was given. But always the same side effects. Personally, I will probably skip over this one next time. The high was great, lasting 2+ hours just enough time for my work commute and started to taper off as I began my day at work. If it wasn't fo...”

“This bud had a deeply earthy nose at first. I kept referring to it as the smell of my grandmother's basement. The earthy/grandma scent was consistent through the smoke. First 30 mins: Produced an incredibly body high. Extremely floaty, giggly, walking on the moon feeling. After 30 mins: zonked for the next hour. Keeps you coming back for more though. Recommended for a long weekend vacay or day at the beach type of th...”
“good good”

“very good indica dominant strain. fruity and think with a little hash flavor. smells really good burning also. helps calm me down and relax, or good for help sleeping. got for urban wellness in Albuquerque for $35 an 1/8 oz.”

“This indica hybrid really delivers. Pungent, dark, citrusy. Pine and floral smoke combined for a really pleasant taste. This weed makes me feel like royalty. A real chest opener, Blue Moonshine is a great strain for yoga and bodywork. This flower makes me feel so revived and cleansed. Eating is a deliciously sensory experience. Sensual. Blue Moonshine allows you to tune in to the world in an upbeat way. Art is glorio...”
“great for couching”

“Tried it mixed half and half with Panama Red.   Can definitely feel the pain
relieving Indica at work.”
“makes me feel extremely relaxed and giggly. one of my favorites.”
“nice I've had all those buds n I highly recommend you have got to try”
“Wow, I haven't felt this couchlocked in a long time. One bowl, I'm down and stoney. Pretty gnarly munchies though.”
“Very tasty! Smooth hits. Starts with a body high and then the relaxation kicks in.”
“good for pain and tension!”
“So amazing.. It was either Blue Moonshine or Blue Mystic. Someone said it was Moonshine but I think it was Mystic.. Not sure, but I couldn't stop giggling. It was great.”
“This strain is definitely for relaxation or sleepy time! Great indica but I was couch locked like no other! Don't expect to be having active boat times !”
“So far so good. I was skeptical to try it but def a good before bed high.”
“Very nice. Awesome smell.”
“Dry and red eyes but the body high feels great. Not hungry but getting kinda sleepy. Was skeptical at first but the smell and the feel proved me otherwise”
“Easily the most euphoric high I have ever had. Never fails to put me in a good mood, and it doesn't make me tired like some indicas.”
“great for sleep. I slept for 9hours and feel alive today!”

“I have always been a fan of Blueberry then I went to All Greens Inc. and Blue Moonshine came HIGHLY recommended. I've been in pain since 2008 (in five different places) constantly so when I find Good Medicine I stick to it. Don't get me wrong, I do like variety as well. Blue Moonshine is now one of my favorites. I WILL be going back for more every month. I would give Blue Moonshine a rating of 5 out of 5 stars. (Very...”

“The only indica my husband and I gave liked so far. This gave us energy, extreme focus and motivation as well as helping with stress, depression and my PTSD. A song came on that we liked abs we danced for a full hour before realizing we weren't in a club! Very surprised this is an indica as those usually put me to sleep!”

“30% my ass I had more effect from the house blend pre rolls than this not worth it save your money and don't believe that they have 30%thc haha what joke just a gimmick to get you to buy their over priced meds go down the road for better quality and better prices never believe this place”
“Me and my husband definitely do not recommend this  strain no effects”
